summary: 1964  was a leap year that began on a Wednesday, in accordance with the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1964  was a leap year starting on Wednesday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1964th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 964th year of the 2nd millennium, the 64th year of the 20th century, and the 5th year of the 1960s decade.
